name: Space Fighter (itch) (hindba)
description:
Welcome to the Space fighter game

This game was created as a requirement for Coursera game development course. 

The modification that has been added to this game is: 

1- CREATED THREE UNIQUE LEVELS WITH CHALLENGES THAT INCREASES WHEN YOU GO TO HIGHER LEVELS. 

2- added dialogs to the game linked to the game story line. 

3- CHANGED the sprite OF THE FINAL GOAL PICKER TO SHIP sprite.  Also a new animation was added to the new ship sprite. 

4- the final level was changed to have a story line. The game ends when the player finds the ship that can take him home back to earth. 

5- the instructions and the credits were added to the game.
